item.title: Where Do I Get Writing Ideas From?
item.description: I’m stuck; I’ve no muse about what to write. I can’t find any idea. Aha… the famous writer’s block. What do I do in those cases? From where does the inspiration to write about stuff come from? Where do I find ideas? How do I find the time? Regarding the second, you make time — it is all a matter of prioritization. I’ve written about time management in the past, and those methods help me to focus.
